alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 2:48AM CST until November 26 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Cook, Dupage, Northern Will and Southern Will Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slick and hazardous travel conditions are expected to quickly develop prior to sunrise this morning. Plan on increased travel times this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; DuPage; Northern Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
